comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: These photos appear to have been taken on the hangar deck of the USS Langley (CV-1). Here are other photos of Langley's hangar deck in the SDASM photostream: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/4822478570/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/4821861935/] Further, this seems to come from the same "cruise book" as a number of other photos of Langley in the SDASM photostream. Note the hand writing below: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/4822489712/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/4822478378/]
